column3: You don't have the look of a pirate, but one can never be too careful on this island.
Inquire about entry into the Sastasha Seagrot.

While not yet fully confirmed, the Sastasha Seagrot is suspected of being a Serpent Reaver hideout. Needless to say, Limsa Lominsa cannot have individuals unknown to the thalassocracy waltzing in and out unchecked. I can grant you entry to the caves, but only if you have the proper authorization.

To enter the Sastasha Seagrot, you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 15 or higher. All members must also have made sufficient progress in the quest “It's Probably Pirates.”
Forays into Sastasha are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
Members level 19 and higher will be synced to level 18 upon entry.
All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area. Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
You were unable to enter <Sheet(InstanceContent,IntegerParameter(2),3)/>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
You don't have the look of a pirate, but one can never be too careful on this island. Unless you have the proper authorization, I can't let you enter the Sastasha Seagrot.
To enter Sastasha, you must have made sufficient progress in the quest “It's Probably Pirates.”
